t: Amazon.jobs: Help us build Earth’s most customer-centric company.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million.
